name: Ananke Seed
description: Procedural generation rights for an Ananke geometry seed.

seed_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the nonce used to generate this seed

engine_version.description: Version of ananke-core used for generation (e.g., '0.1.0')

constraints.description: Bounded parameter constraints for this seed

revocable.description: All Ananke seeds are revocable by design
